rope.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: very strong thick string, made by twisting together many thinner strings
rope.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: They tied a rope around my waist and pulled me up.
The man was coiling a length of rope.
rope.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to tie things together using rope
rope.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Suitcases were roped to the top of the car.
Mountaineers rope themselves together for safety.
rope.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to catch an animal using a circle of rope
rope.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The calves are roped and branded.
